nodes.short_description:
VRFS is a community-driven soccer (football) simulator focused on realistic physics and competitive multiplayer.
Main features of VRFS:
- Realistic physics
- Competitive multiplayer
- Comfortable controls
- No pay-to-win mechanics
- Free for all

VRFS es un simulador de fútbol impulsado por la comunidad, centrado en la física realista y el multijugador competitivo.
Funciones principales de VRFS:
- Física realista
- Multijugador competitivo
- Controles cómodos
- Sin mecánicas de pago para ganar
- Gratis para todos

nodes.display_name: VRFS - サッカーシミュレーター
nodes.short_description:
VRFSは、リアルな物理演算と競技性の高いマルチプレイに重点を置いた、コミュニティ主導のサッカーシミュレーターです。
VRFSの主な特徴：
- リアルな物理演算
- 競技的なマルチプレイ
- 快適な操作性
- 課金による有利要素なし
- 全員無料でプレイ可能

VRFS est un simulateur de football communautaire axé sur la physique réaliste et le multijoueur compétitif.
Principales fonctionnalités de VRFS :
- Physique réaliste
- Multijoueur compétitif
- Commandes confortables
- Aucune mécanique de paiement pour gagner
- Gratuit pour tous

VRFS ist ein Community-gesteuerter Fußballsimulator mit Fokus auf realistischer Physik und kompetitivem Multiplayer.
Hauptfunktionen von VRFS:
- Realistische Physik
- Kompetitiver Multiplayer
- Angenehme Steuerung
- Keine Pay-to-Win-Mechaniken
- Für alle kostenlos

VRFS는 사실적인 물리 엔진과 경쟁적인 멀티플레이에 중점을 둔 커뮤니티 중심의 축구 시뮬레이터입니다.
VRFS의 주요 특징:
- 사실적인 물리 엔진
- 경쟁적인 멀티플레이
- 편안한 조작
- 페이투윈 요소 없음
- 모두에게 무료

nodes.long_description:
VRFS is a community-driven football simulator with focus on realistic physics and competitive online multiplayer.

Here are the main features of VRFS:

FOOTBALL PHYSICS SIMULATION: A player can perform almost any trick from balancing the ball on the tip of the foot to executing curved power shots and long passes. The ball's trajectory is solely determined by physics engine. 

COMPETITIVE ONLINE MODE: The multiplayer architecture allows for an immediate response when a player touches the ball. For example, it is possible to finish a powerful cross at the same speed as in real football, even if the connection is not perfect.

COMFORT: Players move around using thumbsticks and can play in a seated or standing position. No intense hand movement is required.

NO PAY-TO-WIN in VRFS: only skills matter. No one can buy "stronger kicks" or "faster boots." Keep practicing, and you'll feel how you improve.

FREE FOR ALL: Players have full access to the game with no need to purchase anything. However, if you wish, you will be able to buy cool equipment in the store, thus supporting the further development of this project (paid equipment coming soon)

Please, bear in mind that VRFS is still in development, including upcoming upgrades to the physics and scenery. We'd appreciate your suggestions regarding any enhancements.
nodes.short_description:
VRFS is a community-driven football simulator with focus on realistic physics and competitive online multiplayer.

Here are the main features of VRFS:
- Realistic football physics
- Competitive online mode
- Comfortable controls
- No pay-to-win mechanics
- Free for all

Please, bear in mind that VRFS is still in development, including upcoming upgrades to the physics and scenery. We'd appreciate your suggestions regarding any enhancements.

nodes.change_log:
# 🏆 Knockout Tournaments  
Public knockout tournaments are here.  
Teams are scheduled and compete through elimination rounds until the final. As this format is difficult to run without third-party planning, we’ve done our best to bring it to life in a fair and playable way.
Key things to know:  
• Tournaments run **every hour** (more frequently during peak hours)
• Up to **64 teams** per tournament  
• If fewer teams apply, it runs with **32 teams** and so on  
• Matches must be played immediately in the ongoing tournament  
• Teams have **5 minutes** to join each match — after that, a technical defeat is applied
If you miss a match or don’t get in, don’t worry, just join the next tournament. 
We’d appreciate your feedback on tournament formats — regular and knockout — including player counts, arenas, and rulesets.
# More in the update:
🦖 Reckz x VRFS bundle  
⚙️ New setting to disable cosmetics for better performance when needed  
🎁 2026 Free Collectible Ball  
🧩 Optimized replay saving and other improvements

# 🏆 Knockout Tournaments  
Public knockout tournaments are here.  
Teams are scheduled and compete through elimination rounds until the final. As this format is difficult to run without third-party planning, we’ve done our best to bring it to life in a fair and playable way.
Key things to know:  
• Tournaments run **every hour** (more frequently during peak hours)
• Up to **64 teams** per tournament  
• If fewer teams apply, it runs with **32 teams** and so on  
• Matches must be played immediately in the ongoing tournament  
• Teams have **5 minutes** to join each match — after that, a technical defeat is applied
If you miss a match or don’t get in, don’t worry, just join the next tournament. 
We’d appreciate your feedback on tournament formats — regular and knockout — including player counts, arenas, and rulesets.
# More in the update:
🦖 Reckz x VRFS bundle  
⚙️ New setting to disable cosmetics for better performance when needed  
🎁 2026 Free Collectible Ball  
🧩 Optimized replay saving and other improvements

# 🎥 Instant Replays  
This feature is experimental and turned **off by default**. It still requires some work, but we wanted to share it early! In-stadium instant replays are available on all arenas, including custom arenas.
Enable **Instant Replay** in the Settings menu to try it out.  
Replays should run smoothly without lag spikes — please share your feedback for improvements.
# 🎮 Itscntrl x VRFS Collab  
Featuring new gear and the **returning ball** (itscntrl’s idea).
# More in the update:
🥅 All standard goals updated to the new ones  
🧩 Various fixes and enhancements

# 🎥 Instant Replays  
This feature is experimental and turned **off by default**. It still requires some work, but we wanted to share it early! In-stadium instant replays are available on all arenas, including custom arenas.
Enable **Instant Replay** in the Settings menu to try it out.  
Replays should run smoothly without lag spikes — please share your feedback for improvements.
# 🎮 Itscntrl x VRFS Collab  
Featuring new gear and the **returning ball** (itscntrl’s idea).
# More in the update:
🥅 All standard goals updated to the new ones  
🧩 Various fixes and enhancements

# 🧊 Ice Map
The Ice map is back — with the Christmas tree in practice and a hockey-inspired ice rink in Match mode.  
# ❄️ New Winter 3v3 Map
A new 3v3 winter map is added, with the new goals in Match mode.
# More in the update:
⭐ 50+ new items added to the Stars store.

🎄 Three new Christmas bundles are now available.

🔫 Private Lobbies for Lasertag are now supported.

🟩 Enhanced field materials on some arenas.

🥶 Christmas object in the arena editor.

🏃 Locomotion mechanics enhanced.

🧩 Fixed snow trails not showing in replays and other fixes and enhancements.
